question: How much area is considered under the pubic hairs region. How much area do I have to shave?
answer:
QUESTION
I have a lot of hairs on my testies. How much area i have to shave. Please guide me.i know it is compulsory to shave the pubic region(hairs around penis). But i do not know how much area i have to clean around penis and whether i also have to shave hairs which are on the penis and on testies.
ANSWER


Share:
The area of shaving for a person (male/female) is above and around the
private parts. The area immediately under the navel, penis and testicles are
not to be shaven. (Al-Kaamil, commentary of Muslim, Imaam Nawawi, vol.1
pg.128)

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best

Mufti Ebrahim Desai
FATWA DEPT.
